plan_details.script: Sit in a comfortable position with your eyes closed and focus on your breath. When your mind wanders, gently bring your attention back to your breath.
steps: Find a comfortable posture and settle for a few breaths.
Set your intention and focus on the core practice for 25 minutes.
If your attention wanders, gently bring it back without judgment.
Finish by taking a few breaths and opening your eyes slowly.

source_catalog_entry.Name: Mindfulness Meditation
source_catalog_entry.Description: Focuses on being present in the moment and non-judgmentally observing your thoughts and surroundings.
source_catalog_entry.Instructions: Sit in a comfortable position with your eyes closed and focus on your breath. When your mind wanders, gently bring your attention back to your breath.
